name: Day Zero (itch) (CodeManu)
description:
INTRODUCTION

This game was made under the span of 7 days for a jam. - The game was developed by me, @CodeManuPro, if you like what you see you can follow me on Twitter :)

WHAT'S THIS GAME ABOUT

It's an endless survival, you create a character and he has to survive as many days as possible in a city infested with zombies.
But dying is not the end, if you happen to lose a character, you can create a new one and continue playing in the same city.
You can also find your old characters roaming the city.

The game is procedurally generated, including the city layout, buildings, enemies, loot and stuff.

FAQ

Why is there a compatibility folder with another executable?
- That's the game made with another compiler, if your game is crashing or not working at all, try that one.

The game is running with low fps, what can I do to improve it?
- There's a "config.ini" file in the root folder of the game, settings all values to "0" will most likely improve your fps.
